completion:
{ "dishName": "Pasta", "howTo": "Boil the pasta according to the instructions on the packet. Heat oil in a pan and add garlic, onion and sauté for a few minutes. Add the vegetables of your choice and cook for a few minutes. Add the boiled pasta, salt, pepper, oregano, basil and mix everything together. Add the tomato sauce and mix well. Serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Pasta", "Garlic", "Onion", "Vegetables", "Salt", "Pepper", "Oregano", "Basil", "Tomato Sauce" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
PastaAs per packet instructions
Garlic2 cloves
Onion1 medium
Vegetables1 cup
SaltTo taste
PepperTo taste
Oregano1/2 teaspoon
Basil1/2 teaspoon
Tomato Sauce1/2 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pasta", "howTo": "Boil the pasta in a large pot of salted water. Drain the pasta and transfer it to a large bowl. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the tomatoes and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes are softened, about 5 minutes. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese.", "ingredients": [ "Pasta", "Olive Oil", "Garlic", "Tomatoes", "Salt", "Pepper", "Parmesan Cheese" ], "requiredQuantity": "Pasta - 500g
Olive Oil - 2 tablespoons
Garlic - 2 cloves
Tomatoes - 2 cups
Salt - to taste
Pepper - to taste
Parmesan Cheese - as required" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pasta", "howTo": "Boil water in a large pot. Add salt and oil to the boiling water. Add the pasta to the boiling water and stir. Cook the pasta for 8-10 minutes. Drain the pasta and add your favorite sauce. Serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Pasta", "Salt", "Oil", "Sauce" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Pasta1 packet
Salt1 teaspoon
Oil1 tablespoon
SauceAs per taste
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "Beat eggs in a bowl and add salt and pepper to taste. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add butter to the pan and let it melt. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and let it cook for 2 minutes. Flip the omelet and let it cook for another minute. Serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Salt", "Pepper", "Butter" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Eggs2
SaltTo taste
PepperTo taste
Butter1 tablespoon
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "Whisk eggs in a bowl. Add salt, pepper, and any other desired ingredients. Heat a small amount of butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet. As the omelet cooks, use a spatula to lift the edges, allowing the uncooked egg to flow underneath. When the eggs are nearly set, add any desired fillings. Fold the omelet in half and slide it onto a plate.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Salt", "Pepper", "Butter" ], "requiredQuantity": "Eggs - 2
Salt - to taste
Pepper - to taste
Butter - 1 tablespoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are almost set. Add the cheese and any other desired fillings, and cook until the eggs are completely set. Serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Milk", "Salt", "Pepper", "Cheese" ], "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 2
Milk: 2 tablespoons
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
Cheese: 2 tablespoons" }##EOF##

{
    "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs",
    "howTo": "Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add eggs and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, until eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, about 3 minutes. Serve immediately.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Eggs",
        "Butter",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 2-3, Butter: 1 tablespoon, Salt: to taste, Pepper: to taste"
}##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs", "howTo": "
  1. Break 2 eggs into a bowl.
  2. Add salt and pepper to taste.
  3. Whisk the eggs until they are blended.
  4. Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
  5. Pour the egg mixture into the pan.
  6. As the eggs begin to set, gently pull the eggs across the pan with a spatula, forming large soft curds.
  7. Continue cooking – pulling, lifting and folding eggs – until thickened and no visible liquid egg remains.
  8. Remove from heat, add cheese, and serve.
", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Salt", "Pepper", "Butter", "Cheese" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Eggs2
SaltTo Taste
PepperTo Taste
Butter1 tablespoon
CheeseOptional
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs", "howTo": "Break 2 eggs into a bowl. Add a pinch of salt and pepper. Whisk the eggs with a fork. Heat butter in a pan over medium heat. Pour the eggs into the pan. Stir the eggs with a spatula. Cook until the eggs are set. Serve with toast.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Salt", "Pepper", "Butter" ], "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 2
Salt: Pinch
Pepper: Pinch
Butter: 1 tablespoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "Mash together 2 avocados, 1/4 cup diced red onion, 1/4 cup diced tomato, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper in a bowl until desired consistency is reached.", "ingredients": [ "Avocados", "Red Onion", "Tomato", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Garlic Powder", "Salt", "Ground Black Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocados: 2
Red Onion: 1/4 cup
Tomato: 1/4 cup
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons
Lime Juice: 1 tablespoon
Garlic Powder: 1/2 teaspoon
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Ground Black Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "Mash the avocados in a bowl. Add the chopped onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Mix everything together. Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.", "ingredients": [ "Avocados", "Onion", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocados - 2
Onion - 1/4 cup
Cilantro - 2 tablespoons
Lime Juice - 1 tablespoon
Salt - 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "Mash together 2 ripe avocados, 1/4 cup diced red onion, 1/4 cup diced tomato, 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon lime juice, and 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro.", "ingredients": [ "Avocados", "Red Onion", "Tomato", "Garlic", "Cumin", "Cayenne Pepper", "Salt", "Lime Juice", "Cilantro" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocados: 2
Red Onion: 1/4 cup
Tomato: 1/4 cup
Garlic: 1/2 teaspoon
Cumin: 1/2 teaspoon
Cayenne Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Lime Juice: 1 tablespoon
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. 2. Rub the chicken with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 3. Grill the chicken for 8-10 minutes, flipping once, until cooked through. 4. Slice the chicken into strips. 5. In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, and chicken strips. 6. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 7. Serve the salad with a wedge of lemon.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken Breasts", "Lettuce", "Tomatoes", "Avocado", "Olive Oil", "Salt", "Pepper", "Lemon" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken Breasts: 2
Lettuce: 2 cups
Tomatoes: 1 cup
Avocado: 1
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Salt: to taste
Pepper: to taste
Lemon: 1 wedge" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Rub the chicken with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill the chicken for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let cool slightly and cut into cubes. In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, avocado, and chicken. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken Breasts", "Lettuce", "Tomatoes", "Cucumbers", "Avocado", "Olive Oil", "Lemon Juice", "Garlic", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken Breasts: 2
Lettuce: 2 cups
Tomatoes: 1 cup
Cucumbers: 1 cup
Avocado: 1
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Lemon Juice: 2 tablespoons
Garlic: 1 clove
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for 5 minutes per side or until cooked through. Let cool and cut into cubes. In a large bowl, combine lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, grilled chicken, and crumbled cheese. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lime juice, garlic, and cumin. Pour over salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken Breasts", "Salt and Pepper", "Lettuce", "Tomatoes", "Avocado", "Cheese", "Olive Oil", "Lime Juice", "Garlic", "Cumin" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken Breasts: 2
Salt and Pepper: to taste
Lettuce: 2 cups
Tomatoes: 1 cup
Avocado: 1
Cheese: 1/4 cup
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Lime Juice: 2 tablespoons
Garlic: 1 clove, minced
Cumin: 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cloves garlic, 2 cups fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 1/4 cup pine nuts, and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Pulse until the ingredients form a coarse paste. Serve over your favorite pasta.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Basil Leaves", "Parmesan Cheese", "Extra-Virgin Olive Oil", "Pine Nuts", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Garlic2 cloves
Basil Leaves2 cups
Parmesan Cheese1/2 cup
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil1/2 cup
Pine Nuts1/4 cup
Salt1/2 teaspoon
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cups fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Pulse until the mixture is blended and smooth.", "ingredients": [ "Fresh Basil Leaves", "Grated Parmesan Cheese", "Extra-Virgin Olive Oil", "Garlic", "Salt", "Freshly Ground Black Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Fresh Basil Leaves: 2 cups
Grated Parmesan Cheese: 1/2 cup
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil: 1/2 cup
Garlic: 2 cloves
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Freshly Ground Black Pepper: 1/8 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cloves of garlic, 2 cups of fresh basil leaves, 1/4 cup of pine nuts, 1/2 cup of olive oil, 1/2 cup of freshly grated Parmesan cheese, and 1/4 teaspoon of salt. Pulse the ingredients until they are blended together. Taste and adjust the seasoning if necessary. Serve the pesto sauce over your favorite pasta.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Basil Leaves", "Pine Nuts", "Olive Oil", "Parmesan Cheese", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic: 2 cloves
Basil Leaves: 2 cups
Pine Nuts: 1/4 cup
Olive Oil: 1/2 cup
Parmesan Cheese: 1/2 cup
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{
    "dishName": "Chimichurri",
    "howTo": "In a blender, combine garlic, parsley, oregano, red pepper flakes, red wine vinegar, olive oil, and salt. Blend until smooth. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Serve with grilled meats or vegetables.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Garlic",
        "Parsley",
        "Oregano",
        "Red Pepper Flakes",
        "Red Wine Vinegar",
        "Olive Oil",
        "Salt"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Garlic - 2 cloves, Parsley - 1/2 cup, Oregano - 1 teaspoon, Red Pepper Flakes - 1/2 teaspoon, Red Wine Vinegar - 2 tablespoons, Olive Oil - 1/4 cup, Salt - 1 teaspoon"
}##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chimichurri", "howTo": "In a blender, add 1/2 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup red wine vinegar, 4 cloves garlic, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Blend until smooth. Add 1/2 cup fresh parsley and 1/4 cup fresh cilantro. Blend until herbs are finely chopped. Serve with steak, chicken, fish, or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Olive Oil", "Red Wine Vinegar", "Garlic", "Dried Oregano", "Crushed Red Pepper Flakes", "Ground Cumin", "Salt", "Freshly Ground Black Pepper", "Fresh Parsley", "Fresh Cilantro" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Olive Oil1/2 cup
Red Wine Vinegar1/4 cup
Garlic4 cloves
Dried Oregano1/2 teaspoon
Crushed Red Pepper Flakes1/2 teaspoon
Ground Cumin1/2 teaspoon
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Freshly Ground Black Pepper1/4 teaspoon
Fresh Parsley1/2 cup
Fresh Cilantro1/4 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chimichurri", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine garlic, oregano, parsley, red pepper flakes, red wine vinegar, olive oil, and salt. Pulse until the ingredients are finely chopped and combined. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Serve with grilled meats or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Oregano", "Parsley", "Red Pepper Flakes", "Red Wine Vinegar", "Olive Oil", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Garlic2 cloves
Oregano1 teaspoon
Parsley1/2 cup
Red Pepper Flakes1/4 teaspoon
Red Wine Vinegar2 tablespoons
Olive Oil1/4 cup
Salt1/2 teaspoon
" }##EOF##

{
    "dishName": "Pico de Gallo",
    "howTo": "In a medium bowl, combine diced tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Stir to combine. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired. Serve with chips or over tacos, burritos, or enchiladas.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Tomatoes",
        "Onion",
        "Jalapeno",
        "Cilantro",
        "Lime Juice",
        "Salt"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes - 2 cups, Onion - 1/2 cup, Jalapeno - 1/4 cup, Cilantro - 1/4 cup, Lime Juice - 2 tablespoons, Salt - 1/2 teaspoon"
}##EOF##

{
    "dishName": "Pico de Gallo",
    "howTo": "Chop the tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, and cilantro. Combine in a bowl. Squeeze the lime juice over the mixture. Add salt and pepper to taste. Mix together and enjoy!",
    "ingredients": [
        "Tomatoes",
        "Onion",
        "Jalapeno",
        "Cilantro",
        "Lime Juice",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes: 2-3, Onion: 1, Jalapeno: 1, Cilantro: 1/4 cup, Lime Juice: 1/4 cup, Salt: to taste, Pepper: to taste"
}##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pico de Gallo", "howTo": "Chop the tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix. Add the lime juice and season with salt and pepper. Serve chilled.", "ingredients": [ "Tomatoes", "Onion", "Jalapeno", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes - 2
Onion - 1
Jalapeno - 1
Cilantro - 2 tablespoons
Lime Juice - 2 tablespoons
Salt - to taste
Pepper - to taste" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pickled Onions", "howTo": "Slice the onions and place in a bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together the vinegar, sugar, salt, and spices. Pour the mixture over the onions and stir to combine. Place the onions in a jar and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Onions", "Vinegar", "Sugar", "Salt", "Spices" ], "requiredQuantity": "Onions - 2
Vinegar - 1/2 cup
Sugar - 2 tablespoons
Salt - 1 teaspoon
Spices - 1 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pickled Onions", "howTo": "Peel and thinly slice the onions. Place the onions in a large bowl and sprinkle with salt. Mix the onions with your hands until they are evenly coated with salt. Let the onions sit for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, bring the vinegar, sugar, and spices to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour the hot vinegar mixture over the onions and let cool. Transfer the onions and their liquid to a glass jar. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Onions", "Salt", "Vinegar", "Sugar", "Spices" ], "requiredQuantity": "Onions: 2
Salt: 1 teaspoon
Vinegar: 1 cup
Sugar: 1 tablespoon
Spices: 1 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Pickled Onions", "howTo": "1. Slice the onions into thin rings. 2. Place the onions in a bowl and pour in enough white vinegar to cover them. 3. Add 1 teaspoon of salt and 1 teaspoon of sugar to the vinegar. 4. Stir the onions in the vinegar until the salt and sugar dissolve. 5. Place the onions in a jar and pour the vinegar over them. 6. Seal the jar and leave it in the refrigerator for at least 24 hours. 7. Enjoy your pickled onions!", "ingredients": [ "Onions", "White Vinegar", "Salt", "Sugar" ], "requiredQuantity": "Onions - 1kg
White Vinegar - 1 cup
Salt - 1 teaspoon
Sugar - 1 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried dill, 1/4 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Buttermilk", "Sour Cream", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Dill", "Dried Parsley", "Paprika", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Mayonnaise: 1/2 cup
Buttermilk: 1/4 cup
Sour Cream: 1/4 cup
Garlic Powder: 1/4 teaspoon
Onion Powder: 1/4 teaspoon
Dried Dill: 1/4 teaspoon
Dried Parsley: 1/4 teaspoon
Paprika: 1/4 teaspoon
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/8 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/4 teaspoon dried dill, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and 1/8 teaspoon paprika.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Buttermilk", "Sour Cream", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Parsley", "Dried Dill", "Salt", "Black Pepper", "Paprika" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Mayonnaise1/2 cup
Buttermilk1/4 cup
Sour Cream1/4 cup
Garlic Powder1/2 teaspoon
Onion Powder1/2 teaspoon
Dried Parsley1/2 teaspoon
Dried Dill1/4 teaspoon
Salt1/4 teaspoon
Black Pepper1/4 teaspoon
Paprika1/8 teaspoon
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/4 teaspoon dried dill, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Buttermilk", "Sour Cream", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Parsley", "Dried Dill", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Mayonnaise: 1/2 cup
Buttermilk: 1/4 cup
Sour Cream: 1/4 cup
Garlic Powder: 1/4 teaspoon
Onion Powder: 1/4 teaspoon
Dried Parsley: 1/4 teaspoon
Dried Dill: 1/4 teaspoon
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large pot, combine the chicken, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns, and enough water to cover the chicken. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 45 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside. Increase the heat to medium-high and reduce the sauce until it thickens. Return the chicken to the pot and simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is thick, about 10 minutes. Serve with steamed white rice.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Garlic", "Soy Sauce", "Vinegar", "Bay Leaves", "Peppercorns", "Water" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Chicken1kg
Garlic2 cloves
Soy Sauce1/2 cup
Vinegar1/2 cup
Bay Leaves2
Peppercorns1 tsp
Water2 cups
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large pot, combine chicken, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, black pepper, and water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 45 minutes. Remove chicken from pot and set aside. In a separate pan, heat oil and sauté garlic until golden brown. Add the chicken back into the pot and stir in the sautéed garlic. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes. Serve with steamed white rice.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Garlic", "Soy Sauce", "Vinegar", "Bay Leaves", "Black Pepper", "Water", "Oil" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken - 2 lbs
Garlic - 6 cloves
Soy Sauce - 1/2 cup
Vinegar - 1/2 cup
Bay Leaves - 2
Black Pepper - 1 teaspoon
Water - 1 cup
Oil - 2 tablespoons" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large pot, combine the chicken, garlic, onion, bay leaves, vinegar, soy sauce, and black pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes. Add the potatoes and simmer for an additional 15 minutes. Serve hot with steamed rice.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Garlic", "Onion", "Bay Leaves", "Vinegar", "Soy Sauce", "Black Pepper", "Potatoes" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Chicken2 lbs
Garlic4 cloves
Onion1 medium
Bay Leaves2
Vinegar1/2 cup
Soy Sauce1/2 cup
Black Pepper1 teaspoon
Potatoes2 medium
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper. Cook until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 5 minutes. Add paprika, cumin, and oregano and cook for 1 minute. Add tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes. Add parsley and cook for 1 minute. Serve with rice or potatoes.", "ingredients": [ "Olive oil", "Garlic", "Shrimp", "Salt", "Pepper", "Paprika", "Cumin", "Oregano", "Tomatoes", "Parsley" ], "requiredQuantity": "Olive oil - 2 tablespoons
Garlic - 4 cloves, minced
Shrimp - 1 pound, peeled and deveined
Salt - 1 teaspoon
Pepper - 1/2 teaspoon
Paprika - 1 teaspoon
Cumin - 1 teaspoon
Oregano - 1 teaspoon
Tomatoes - 2, diced
Parsley - 2 tablespoons, chopped" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 3 minutes. Add the tomato sauce and cook, stirring, until heated through, about 2 minutes. Serve over cooked rice, if desired.", "ingredients": [ "Olive oil", "Garlic", "Shrimp", "Salt", "Pepper", "Tomato sauce" ], "requiredQuantity": "Olive oil - 2 tablespoons
Garlic - 2 cloves, minced
Shrimp - 1 pound, peeled and deveined
Salt - 1/4 teaspoon
Pepper - 1/4 teaspoon
Tomato sauce - 1/2 cup" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and cook, stirring occasionally, until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 4 minutes. Add paprika, cumin, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir in parsley and lemon juice. Serve over cooked rice or with crusty bread.", "ingredients": [ "Olive oil", "Garlic cloves", "Shrimp", "Smoked paprika", "Ground cumin", "Salt and pepper", "Fresh parsley", "Lemon juice" ], "requiredQuantity": "Olive oil: 2 tablespoons
Garlic cloves: 4, minced
Shrimp: 1 pound, peeled and deveined
Smoked paprika: 1 teaspoon
Ground cumin: 1 teaspoon
Salt and pepper: to taste
Fresh parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Lemon juice: 1 tablespoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and enjoy!", "ingredients": [ "Avocado", "Frozen Berries", "Banana", "Almond Milk" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Avocado1
Frozen Berries1 cup
Banana1
Almond Milk1 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Add 1 cup of frozen berries, 1/2 an avocado, 1/2 cup of almond milk, 1/4 teaspoon of honey, and a few ice cubes to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and enjoy!", "ingredients": [ "Frozen Berries", "Avocado", "Almond Milk", "Honey", "Ice Cubes" ], "requiredQuantity": "Frozen Berries: 1 cup
Avocado: 1/2
Almond Milk: 1/2 cup
Honey: 1/4 teaspoon
Ice Cubes: Few" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Add the avocado, banana, frozen berries, almond milk, honey, and ice to a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.", "ingredients": [ "Avocado", "Banana", "Frozen Berries", "Almond Milk", "Honey", "Ice" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocado - 1/2
Banana - 1
Frozen Berries - 1 cup
Almond Milk - 1/2 cup
Honey - 1 tablespoon
Ice - 1/2 cup" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Butter Chicken", "howTo": "In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a baking dish. Arrange the chicken in the dish. Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. In a large skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Stir in the tomato sauce, cream, and honey. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add the cooked chicken and heat through. Serve over hot cooked basmati rice.", "ingredients": [ "Yogurt", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Garam Masala", "Cumin", "Coriander", "Cayenne Pepper", "Salt", "Chicken", "Butter", "Tomato Sauce", "Cream", "Honey", "Basmati Rice" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Yogurt1 cup
Garlic2 cloves
Ginger1 teaspoon
Garam Masala1 teaspoon
Cumin1 teaspoon
Coriander1 teaspoon
Cayenne Pepper1/2 teaspoon
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Chicken2 pounds
Butter4 tablespoons
Tomato Sauce1 cup
Cream1/2 cup
Honey2 tablespoons
Basmati Rice3 cups
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Roti", "howTo": "Mix the flour, salt and oil in a bowl. Add water gradually to form a soft dough. Knead the dough for 5-7 minutes until it turns soft and pliable. { "dishName": "Roti", "howTo": "

Mix the flour, salt and oil in a bowl. Add water gradually and knead the dough until it is soft and pliable. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 15 minutes. Divide the dough into small balls. Roll out each ball into a thin circle. Heat a tawa (griddle) and place the rolled out roti on it. Cook it on both sides until it is golden brown. Serve hot.

", "ingredients": [ "Flour", "Salt", "Oil", "Water" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Flour2 cups
Salt1 teaspoon
Oil2 tablespoons
Water1/2 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Roti", "howTo": "Mix together 1 cup wheat flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon sugar and 3 tablespoons of oil. Add warm water and knead into a soft dough. Divide the dough into small balls. Roll out each ball into a thin circle. Heat a skillet over medium heat. Place the rolled out dough on the skillet. Cook for a few seconds and flip it over. Cook for a few more seconds and flip it again. Apply oil on both sides of the roti and cook for a few more seconds. Remove from heat and serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Wheat Flour", "Salt", "Sugar", "Oil", "Warm Water" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Wheat Flour1 cup
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Sugar1/2 teaspoon
Oil3 tablespoons
Warm WaterAs needed
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Coca-Cola Cake", "howTo": "

Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, melted butter, eggs and Coca-Cola. Beat for 2 minutes at medium speed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake for 35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before frosting.

To make the frosting, melt butter in a medium saucepan. Stir in cocoa and Coca-Cola. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in powdered sugar and vanilla. Beat until smooth. Spread over cooled cake.

", "ingredients": [ "Cake mix", "Butter", "Eggs", "Coca-Cola", "Butter", "Cocoa", "Powdered sugar", "Vanilla" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Cake mix1
Butter1/2 cup (melted)
Eggs3
Coca-Cola1 cup
Butter1/2 cup (melted)
Cocoa1/4 cup
Powdered sugar2 cups
Vanilla1 teaspoon
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Coca-Cola Cake", "howTo": "Preheat oven to 350°F (177°C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the cake mix, Coca-Cola, oil, and eggs until combined. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake for 35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For the frosting, in a medium saucepan, bring the Coca-Cola, butter, and cocoa powder to a boil. Boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in the powdered sugar and vanilla. Beat until smooth. Spread over cooled cake.", "ingredients": [ "Cake Mix", "Coca-Cola", "Oil", "Eggs", "Butter", "Cocoa Powder", "Powdered Sugar", "Vanilla" ], "requiredQuantity": "Cake Mix - 1 box
Coca-Cola - 1 cup
Oil - 1/2 cup
Eggs - 3
Butter - 1/2 cup
Cocoa Powder - 1/2 cup
Powdered Sugar - 3 cups
Vanilla - 1 teaspoon" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Coca-Cola Cake", "howTo": "
  1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan.
  2. In a medium bowl, stir together the cake mix, melted butter, 1 egg, and 1 can of Coca-Cola. Beat for 2 minutes, and pour into the prepared pan.
  3. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. Allow to cool.
  4. In a medium bowl, mix together the powdered sugar, cocoa, butter, and remaining can of Coca-Cola. Spread over the cooled cake.
", "ingredients": [ "Cake Mix", "Butter", "Eggs", "Coca-Cola", "Powdered Sugar", "Cocoa" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Cake Mix1
Butter1/2 cup, melted
Eggs2
Coca-Cola2 cans
Powdered Sugar2 cups
Cocoa1/2 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Grilled Cheese Sandwhich", "howTo": "Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread. Place one slice of bread, butter side down, in a skillet over medium heat. Layer cheese, then desired toppings, then more cheese, and top with the second slice of bread, butter side up. Grill until lightly golden brown and cheese is melted, about 3-4 minutes per side.", "ingredients": [ "Bread", "Butter", "Cheese", "Toppings" ], "requiredQuantity": "Bread: 2 slices
Butter: 2 tsp
Cheese: 2 slices
Toppings: as desired" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, cayenne, and salt. Add the chicken and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or overnight. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking dish with oil or cooking spray. Place the chicken in the baking dish and bake for 20 minutes. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the tomato paste, garam masala, cumin, cayenne, and salt. Cook for 2 minutes. Add the cream and bring to a simmer. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add the chicken and any accumulated juices to the sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the cilantro and remove from heat. Serve over cooked basmati rice.", "ingredients": [ "Yogurt", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Garam Masala", "Cumin", "Cayenne", "Salt", "Chicken", "Oil", "Onion", "Tomato Paste", "Cream", "Cilantro" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Yogurt1 cup
Garlic2 cloves
Ginger1 tablespoon
Garam Masala1 teaspoon
Cumin1 teaspoon
Cayenne1/4 teaspoon
Salt1 teaspoon
Chicken2 pounds
Oil2 tablespoons
Onion1
Tomato Paste2 tablespoons
Cream1/2 cup
Cilantro1/4 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "In a bowl, mix together the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, paprika, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken to the bowl and stir until the chicken is completely coated in the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet with oil. Place the chicken onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute. Pour in the tomato sauce and stir in the garam masala, cumin, paprika, and cayenne pepper. Simmer until the sauce thickens, about 10 minutes. Add the cream and simmer for 5 minutes more. Add the cooked chicken and stir until the chicken is heated through, about 5 minutes. Serve with cooked basmati rice.", "ingredients": [ "Yogurt", "Lemon Juice", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Garam Masala", "Cumin", "Paprika", "Cayenne Pepper", "Salt", "Chicken", "Oil", "Onion", "Tomato Sauce", "Cream" ], "requiredQuantity": "Yogurt: 1 cup

Garlic: 2 cloves, minced
Ginger: 1 teaspoon, grated
Garam Masala: 1 teaspoon
Cumin: 1 teaspoon
Paprika: 1 teaspoon
Cayenne Pepper: 1/2 teaspoon
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
Chicken: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
Oil: 1 tablespoon
Onion: 1, chopped
Tomato Sauce: 1 (15 ounce) can
Cream: 1/2 cup" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "Marinate chicken in a mixture of yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, and cayenne pepper for at least 30 minutes. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook until golden brown. Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add the onion and cook until softened. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for an additional minute. Add the tomato puree, garam masala, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Cook for 5 minutes. Add the cream and cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve over basmati rice.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Yogurt", "Lemon Juice", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Garam Masala", "Cumin", "Cayenne Pepper", "Oil", "Onion", "Tomato Puree", "Salt", "Cream", "Basmati Rice" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken: 500g
